meanings.sent1: The rope was tensioned tightly across the gap.
meanings.sent2: The tensioned wire held the weight without breaking.
meanings.sent3: The tensioned rubber band flew across the room when released.
meanings.sent4: His tensioned nerves made him jittery before the performance.
meanings.sent5: The tensioned atmosphere in the room was palpable.

meanings.sent1: She tensioned the strings of the guitar before the concert.
meanings.sent2: The tensioned spring provided the necessary force for the mechanism.
meanings.sent3: The tensioned bowstring twanged loudly when released.
meanings.sent4: His tensioned grip on the steering wheel showed his determination.
meanings.sent5: The tensioned relationship between the characters added depth to the story.

meanings.sent1: The tensioned fabric of the trampoline allowed for high jumps.
meanings.sent2: The tensioned canvas on the frame created a smooth surface.
meanings.sent3: The tensioned elastic band snapped back when pulled.
meanings.sent4: The tensioned skin of the drum produced a clear sound.
meanings.sent5: The tensioned wire fence kept the animals safely enclosed.
